EmailTemplate.name: SW: Attending PIE but YYPG cannot attend
EmailTemplate.subject: SW confirmed PIE attendence but YPPG cannot attend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name}'s support worker has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but {!Contact.Name} cannot make it. Please liase with both {!Contact.Name} and their SW to arrange a alternative meeting.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a SW has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but the YPPG cannot attend.
